body_html: clamp is not differentiable everywhere. It is differentiable on (min, max), (-infty, min), and (max, infty). Because of that, I would expect it to not have gradients at min or max: they're being set to zero here, which is good.
body_text: clamp is not differentiable everywhere. It is differentiable on (min, max), (-infty, min), and (max, infty). Because of that, I would expect it to not have gradients at min or max: they're being set to zero here, which is good.
body: `clamp` is not differentiable everywhere. It is differentiable on `(min, max)`, `(-infty, min)`, and `(max, infty)`. Because of that, I would expect it to not have gradients at `min` or `max`: they're being set to zero here, which is good.
